name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 22: The Pro Wrestling
overview: Powerful wrestlers drawn in full polygon, engaged in hot blooded battle! Simple 1500 Series Vol.22 - The Pro Wrestling is a wrestling game that features 20 different characters and different game modes, enjoy 2 players in Battle Royal and Death Match. Edit Mode allows you to create your very own wrestler. Easy to play , no complex button system. Champion Road takes you through a 10 stage tournament.
